price: But those who disbelieve and reject Our verses, for them there will be a humiliating punishment.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
